about: Self-hosted collection of powerful web-based tools for everyday tasks. No ads, no tracking, just fast, accessible utilities right from your browser!
summary:
# Project Summary

## 1. Core Content and Main Problems Solved
OmniTools is a self-hosted, web-based collection of tools designed to simplify daily tasks. It offers a range of powerful utilities that cover image/video processing, string/list manipulation, date and time calculations, mathematical operations, and other miscellaneous features (such as JSON, PDF, and CSV tools). Through these tools, OmniTools primarily addresses the following issues:
- Provides ad-free, tracking-free efficient tools that can be used directly in the browser.
- Offers a variety of practical functions tailored to the needs of developers, designers, and other professionals.
- Supports user self-hosting, protecting privacy and ensuring data security.

---

## 2. Breakthroughs or Innovations
OmniTools demonstrates breakthroughs and innovations in the following areas:
- **Comprehensiveness**: Integrates multiple types of tools, covering a wide range of needs from image processing to mathematical computations.
- **Self-hosting Feature**: Allows users to run the application on their own servers, avoiding privacy and security issues that may arise from reliance on third-party services.
- **Open-source Collaboration**: As a React + TypeScript project, it supports community contributions and encourages developers to participate in the creation and improvement of tools.
- **Usability**: Provides simple and quick deployment via Docker and Docker Compose, lowering the technical barrier.
- **Continuous Expansion**: The project team continuously adds new tools and optimizes existing features, keeping the project vibrant and practical.

---

## 3. Good Ideas for Startup Projects
Based on the characteristics of OmniTools, here are several potential directions suitable for startups:

### (1) **Personalized Tool Platform**
- Develop a customized toolset targeting specific industries or demographics, such as providing image processing tools for designers or code-related tools for developers.
- Custom tool modules can be developed based on client needs and offered as subscription services.

### (2) **SaaS-based Tool Service**
- Transform OmniTools into a cloud-based SaaS platform, offering premium features on a pay-as-you-go basis (such as batch processing, advanced format conversion, etc.).
- Add user management, data analysis, and other functionalities to enhance the user experience.

### (3) **Educational and Training Tools**
- Combine OmniTools' math and programming tools to create an online learning platform for students.
- Provide interactive tutorials and exercises to help students master programming, mathematics, and related skills.

### (4) **Enterprise-level Solutions**
- For enterprise users, provide a private deployment version supporting large-scale data processing and more complex workflows.
- Add features like permission management and log recording to meet internal collaboration needs within enterprises.

### (5) **Mobile Extensions**
- Port the core functionalities of OmniTools to mobile platforms, developing iOS and Android applications for convenient use anytime and anywhere.
- Offer offline modes to enhance user experience.

By pursuing any of the above directions, the technical and functional advantages of OmniTools can be fully utilized to create products and services with strong market competitiveness.
text:
Welcome to OmniTools, a self-hosted web app offering a variety of online tools to simplify everyday tasks.
Whether you are coding, manipulating images/videos, PDFs or crunching numbers, OmniTools has you covered. Please don't
forget to
star the repo to support us.
Here is the
demo
website.
Table of Contents
Features
Self-host
Contribute
License
Contact
Features
We strive to offer a variety of tools, including:
Image/Video/Binary Tools
Image Resizer
Image Converter
Video Trimmer
Video Reverser
And more...
String/List Tools
Case Converters
List Shuffler
Text Formatters
And more...
Date and Time Tools
Date Calculators
Time Zone Converters
And more...
Math Tools
Generate Prime Numbers
Generate Perfect Numbers
And more...
Miscellaneous Tools
JSON Tools
PDF Tools
CSV Tools
And more...
Stay tuned as we continue to expand and improve our collection!
Self-host/Run
Docker
docker run -d --name omni-tools --restart unless-stopped -p 8080:80 iib0011/omni-tools:latest
Docker Compose
services
:
omni-tools
:
image
:
iib0011/omni-tools:latest
container_name
:
omni-tools
restart
:
unless-stopped
ports
:
      -
"
8080:80
"
Contribute
This is a React Project with Typescript Material UI. We use icons from
Iconify
Project setup
git clone https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools.git
cd
omni-tools
npm i
npm run dev
Create a new tool
npm run script:create:tool my-tool-name folder1
#
npm run script:create:tool split pdf
For tools located under multiple nested directories, use:
npm run script:create:tool my-tool-name folder1/folder2
#
npm run script:create:tool compress image/png
Use
folder1\folder2
on Windows.
Run tests
npm run
test
For e2e tests
npm run test:e2e
ü§ù Looking to contribute?
We welcome contributions! You can help by:
‚úÖ Reporting bugs
‚úÖ Suggesting new features in Github issues or
here
‚úÖ Improving documentation
‚úÖ Submitting pull requests
You can also join our
Discord server
Contributors
Contact
For any questions or suggestions, feel free to open an issue or contact me at:
ibracool99@gmail.com
License
This project is licensed under the MIT License. See the
LICENSE
file for details.
readme: Welcome to OmniTools, a self-hosted web app offering a variety of online tools to simplify everyday tasks. Whether you are coding, manipulating images/videos, PDFs or crunching numbers, OmniTools has you covered. Please don't forget to star the repo to support us. Here is the [demo](https://omnitools.app) website. ![img.png](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iib0011/omni-tools/main/img.png) ## Table of Contents - [Features](#features) - [Self-host](#self-hostrun) - [Contribute](#contribute) - [License](#license) - [Contact](#contact) ## Features We strive to offer a variety of tools, including: ## **Image/Video/Binary Tools** - Image Resizer - Image Converter - Video Trimmer - Video Reverser - And more... ## **String/List Tools** - Case Converters - List Shuffler - Text Formatters - And more... ## **Date and Time Tools** - Date Calculators - Time Zone Converters - And more... ## **Math Tools** - Generate Prime Numbers - Generate Perfect Numbers - And more... ## **Miscellaneous Tools** - JSON Tools - PDF Tools - CSV Tools - And more... Stay tuned as we continue to expand and improve our collection! ## Self-host/Run ### Docker ```bash docker run -d --name omni-tools --restart unless-stopped -p 8080:80 iib0011/omni-tools:latest ``` ### Docker Compose ```yaml services: omni-tools: image: iib0011/omni-tools:latest container_name: omni-tools restart: unless-stopped ports: - "8080:80" ``` ## Contribute This is a React Project with Typescript Material UI. We use icons from [Iconify](https://icon-sets.iconify.design) ### Project setup ```bash git clone https://github.com/iib0011/omni-tools.git cd omni-tools npm i npm run dev ``` ### Create a new tool ```bash npm run script:create:tool my-tool-name folder1 # npm run script:create:tool split pdf ``` For tools located under multiple nested directories, use: ```bash npm run script:create:tool my-tool-name folder1/folder2 # npm run script:create:tool compress image/png ``` Use `folder1\folder2` on Windows. ### Run tests ```bash npm run test ``` - For e2e tests ```bash npm run test:e2e ``` ## ü§ù Looking to contribute? We welcome contributions! You can help by: - ‚úÖ Reporting bugs - ‚úÖ Suggesting new features in Github issues or [here](https://tally.so/r/nrkkx2) - ‚úÖ Improving documentation - ‚úÖ Submitting pull requests You can also join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/SDbbn3hT4b) ### Contributors ## Contact For any questions or suggestions, feel free to open an issue or contact me at: [ibracool99@gmail.com](mailto:ibracool99@gmail.com) ## License This project is licensed under the MIT License. See the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details.
author: iib0011
